info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 3:29PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong westerly wind shift and snow showers will impact Beaverhead and Madison Counties through this evening... At 326 PM MST, A Pacific cold front was causing winds to shift to the west and gust in excess of 50 mph at times. HAZARD...Wind gusts at 50 mph or greater, snow showers, and blowing snow. Visibility as low as a half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel due to significantly reduced visibility and slippery roads. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Sheridan, Virginia City, Ennis, Twin Bridges, Lima, Jackson, Pony, Monida, Wisdom, Alder, Silver Star, Dell, Bannack Pass, Melrose, Wise River, Dewey, Cameron, Snowline and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
